title: The Witless Wisdom of Michele Bachmann
description: Michele Bachmann has served Minnesota as a state senator and as a member of the House of Representatives for the 6th congressional district. As a leader of the Republican Party, Bachmann has been outspoken in the opposition to the policies of President Barack Obama and the Democratic Party. She has also be a champion of the Tea Party movement.Over the course of her time in elected office and as a candidate for President of the United States, Bachmann has been known for her humorous and sometimes alarming political gaffes. Her quotes and sayings have become political fodder for her opponents and a source of ridicule for journalists and television pundits.The Witless Wisdom of Michele Bachmann is a well-researched with over 60 sources and carefully edited collection of quotes that will have you either laughing out loud or cringing in disbelief.
author: Charlotte Nixon
